MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G83 postcode area of Alexandria, affecting properties in Balloch Road and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.34am. Our engineers are on their way to the local substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible 12.45pm.  Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10am on 26th April 2021
